title: Brick Mansions film's trailer typo
author: rafacardona

comments.content:
It could be **Quarterback** a font designed by Dom Nokes  
(see the sample bellow)  
More info on the designer by Luc Devroye:  
 [http://luc.devroye.org/fonts-50179.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317113109/http:/luc.devroye.org/fonts-50179.html "http://luc.devroye.org/fonts-50179.html")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317113109im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Quarterback_6478.jpg)

Wow! Good catch, Fivos! Was having hard time with this one. First thought I could have been a [Jeff Levine](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317113109/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Jeff_Levine)'s font but finally found nothing part of loosely close alternative with [Pop Warner](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317113109/http:/www.dafont.com/pop-warner.font).
Fvilanakis, you are the best! Thanks!
